entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • installation rollback - dotnet workload install android #23573
    Discussion
  • The user as nt authority is fail to upgrade to 6.0.102 with 17.0.5 pre-installed #23567
    6.0.2xx

Closed

  • .NET SDK 5.0.402 to .NET SDK 5.0.403 compilation failure with CA1416: Validate platform compatibility #22546
  • Adjust sdk with global using #19021
  • Naming of the properties that control implicit namespaces included by the SDK #18839
  • How to deploy a Windows Service in VS2019 #23537
  • Inconsistent error code for NETSDK1174 #22639
    6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow pdb deltas to be applied to Blazor WASM app #23581
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Switch to 1ES pools for publishing #23575
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • `dotnet watch` test fix search console history #23521
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch, 6.0.3xx
  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore, 6.0.3xx

Updated

  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.3xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1570951 #23536
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23532
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile
  • [release/6.0.x] Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23336
    Area-ILLink
